message: Ahoy Freshers !! Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur brings the most awaited opportunity at your door. With the motto to assist the students and make their time a happy and fruitful one by improving their skills and attitude, we invite application from all the UG 1st years to be a part of our team. Register yourself here at http://swgiitkgp.in/recru... Deadline : October 1st Midnight For details, Contact : Vaibhav : +91-8768829412 Veda : +91-7384019601

Here comes the amazing encounter of Sarthak Badjatiya at Credit Suisse, sharing his exposure and experience he had there.All the people interested in finance, here is a wonderful opportunity to work with a multinational company. All the best to you :) http://swgiitkgp.in/fores...
